Gamemaster¶

Concepts¶

Gamemaster allows for controlling levels and level status via the API. It is worth experimenting with the information provided in the level status as it gives feedback on risk limits and other messages that appear in the web interface when the level is active.

Brief docs can be found on the Stockfighters forums.

Docs¶

class stockfighter.Gamemaster(api_key)¶
levels()¶

Retrieve list of available levels.

restart_level(instance_id)¶

Pass a known instance id to restart a level.

resume_level(instance_id)¶

Resume a level with a given instance id.

start_level(level_name)¶

Begin a certain level.

status(instance_id)¶

Get status of level.

stop_level(instance_id)¶

Stop a level with a given instance id.
